summary: The Comptroller General testified before Congress about the government’s unsustainable fiscal outlook, the need for a long-term plan to address growing debt, and other aspects of the nation's fiscal health. For example, public debt as a share of the economy is projected to top its record level within 13 to 20 years. Its continued growth is unsustainable. A plan to put the government on a...
title: The Nation's Fiscal Health: Actions Needed to Achieve Long-Term Fiscal Sustainability
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
